thread.title: Postcards from London: Meeting the real Don Draper
thread.title_full: Postcards from London: Meeting the real Don Draper

title: Postcards from London: Meeting the real Don Draper
text: Postcards from London: Meeting the real Don Draper The journey to London to cover the Bills was a long and tiring one. Post to Facebook Postcards from London: Meeting the real Don Draper The journey to London to cover the Bills was a long and tiring one. Check out this story on DemocratandChronicle.com: http://on.rocne.ws/1LIUsTj Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Postcards from London: Meeting the real Don Draper Sal Maiorana , @salmaiorana 6:18 p.m. EDT October 23, 2015 General view of a mural of Buffalo Bills running back LeSean McCoy (25) and Jacksonville Jaguars quarterback Blake Bortles at Niketown London. Kirby Lee-USA TODAY Sports Bills offensive line coach Aaron Kromer (right) with guard Kraig Urbik (60) at practice Thursday. Kirby Lee-USA TODAY Sports View of NFL banners and British and United States flags on Regent Street. Kirby Lee-USA TODAY Sports Bills quarterback E.J. Manuel (3) and tight end Charles Clay (85) at practice Thursday at The Grove. Kirby Lee-USA TODAY Sports Bills coach Rex Ryan at press conference at the Grove hotel. Kirby Lee-USA TODAY Sports Fullscreen Buffalo Bills quarterback EJ Manuel takes part in an NFL training session at the Grove Hotel in Chandler's Cross, England, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015. The Buffalo Bills play the Jacksonville Jaguars at Wembley stadium in London on Sunday in a regular season NFL game. Matt Dunham, AP Fullscreen Buffalo Bills head coach Rex Ryan, left, speaks to defensive end Mario Williams during an NFL training session at the Grove Hotel in Chandler's Cross, England, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015. The Buffalo Bills play the Jacksonville Jaguars at Wembley stadium in London on Sunday in a regular season NFL game.
